yolnahkriin.name: Yolnahkriin
yolnahkriin.description: Fire Dragon, whose mechanics are mostly fire atronachs and fiery breath. On HM atronachs need to be pulled under the boss to burn in AoE

sets.why: You don't get direct damage, so you don't lose stacks
You don't get direct damage, so you don't lose stacks
On HM you have to kill atronachs with AoE, so this set is perfect for HM
As soon as Dragon does not move, you will always put a bleed and AoE damage is great for HM

lokkestiiz.name: Lokkestiiz
lokkestiiz.description: Ice Dragon,, whose mechanics are ice breath, ice tombs, shock and ice atronachs and shock beam which requires positioning on HM

sets.why: You're constantly in a fight (except for beam phase) - so your stacks will be maxed
As soon as you have to kill storm atronachs grouped, AoE damage of this set would be great
As soon as you have to kill storm atronachs grouped, AoE damage of this set would be great
Storm atronachs fight is the biggest part of fight. If you don't want to put a trap each time - this set works very well

nahviintaas.name: Nahviintaas
nahviintaas.description: Last boss of SS. Main mechanics are trashpacks, sweep, breath and portals. Portal DDs are on their own and need to kill a mini-boss inside. On the execute phase - meteors. HM adds a slow-walking shielded mini-boss on main arena which can be damaged only short periods of time

sets.why: It's a basic medium set which won't require anything to max stacks
Nothing stops you from lowering stamina. Just keep it enough for a block on sweep
Big part of the fight is a trash fight. This set works very nice with stacked packs
Boss is either standing or causing trash packs. Both cases are good for this set
This set might be useful for portal DDs. You have to max out your DPS and find some buffs at the same time, and free slot might be handy

no_sets.why: You are either fighting trash or in portal. Both cases you block sweep, so it's impossible to keep 10 stacks for a long time.
